name: JITX
headline: Automatic circuit board design.

The Fastest Pathto Higher QualityCircuit Board Design
JITX is a next generation electronic systems design platform.EDA’s premier code-based PCB AI-driven design tool.
[Start for free](http://www.jitx.com/</plans>)[Schedule a demo](http://www.jitx.com/</contact>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6044fe74a6d10f4cc8723975/63a39761da8488262186bbc9_ALtiumLogo.png)](http://www.jitx.com/<https:/podcast.altium.com/e/jitx-a-way-for-design-engineers-to-write-codes/>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6044fe74a6d10f4cc8723975/63ee65aa08f04f63cd529556_CustomerLogos.png)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6044fe74a6d10f4cc8723975/6387974317d78e5a0a5f4805_TechCrunch.png)](http://www.jitx.com/<https:/techcrunch.com/2022/09/20/jitx-wants-to-change-the-way-engineers-design-circuit-boards-using-code/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6044fe74a6d10f4cc8723975/638796b7d341876931d0e7ca_IEEESpectrum.svg)](http://www.jitx.com/<https:/spectrum.ieee.org/tech-talk/computing/hardware/startup-jitx-uses-ai-to-automate-complex-circuit-board-design>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6044fe74a6d10f4cc8723975/63a397d7ed59550e1603afee_Allaboutcircuits.png)](http://www.jitx.com/<https:/www.allaboutcircuits.com/podcast/jitx-aims-provide-superpowers-circuit-design-engineers/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6044fe74a6d10f4cc8723975/6387961e2d4475a984876c3a_logo.png)](http://www.jitx.com/<https:/hackaday.com/2018/10/16/cool-tools-deus-ex-autorouter/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/plugins/Basic/assets/placeholder.60f9b1840c.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/plugins/Basic/assets/placeholder.60f9b1840c.svg)
Cofactr
Yorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc vulputate libero et velit interdum, ac aliquet odio mattis.
[Learn more](http://www.jitx.com/</product>)
New automation saves you time and money
JITX customers have seen their design cycles accelerate between 2X - 30X. New capabilities like SI-optimizing autorouters design complex working boards faster than you thought possible.
[Learn more](http://www.jitx.com/</product>)
Design better boards
Code automates signal integrity constraints and lets you optimize pin assignments on the fly — without ever making a mistake. Customers save thousands of dollars on each board run by shrinking their designs and increasing reliability.
[Learn more](http://www.jitx.com/</product>)
Maintain Complete Control
JITX gives you complete control over your designs to ensure they meet your exact specifications. Automate repetitive tasks so you can do the interesting, high value design work. And always maintain control so you can get the exact result you want, every time.
[Learn more](http://www.jitx.com/</product>)
Handle Supply Chain Disruption Easily
Need to replace an out-of-stock part? Use JITX to do it effortlessly and determine whether your design still works by using comprehensive checks. 
[Learn more](http://www.jitx.com/</product>)
Create Ambitious DesignsAlways on Schedule
[Start for free](http://www.jitx.com/</plans>)[Schedule a demo](http://www.jitx.com/</contact>)
[](http://www.jitx.com/<#>)

generated_description:
**JITX Overview**

Founded in Berkeley, CA, JITX is at the forefront of revolutionizing electronic systems design with a straightforward mission: to automate circuit board design. Operating from the vibrant San Francisco Bay Area, JITX is leveraging cutting-edge artificial intelligence and automation tools to streamline the creation of printed circuit boards (PCBs). As part of Y Combinator's Summer 2018 batch, they have a dedicated team of 18 employees, including notable Group Partner Michael Seibel.

**What They Do**

JITX offers a next-generation electronic design automation (EDA) platform that transforms how engineers approach PCB design. Their tools enable designers to write code, which significantly enhances the design process's speed and accuracy. Some highlights of what JITX brings to the table include:

1. **Accelerated Design Cycles**: Customers report design timelines improving by 2X to 30X. Their automated tools, including signal integrity-optimizing autorouters, allow engineers to produce complex PCB designs faster than ever before.
  
2. **Cost-Saving Automation**: By automating routine tasks, JITX enables engineers to focus on high-value design work, paving the way for savings of thousands of dollars per design iteration.
  
3. **Control and Flexibility**: JITX empowers designers with full control over their PCB specifications, allowing for on-the-fly optimizations without sacrificing quality.

4. **Supply Chain Resilience**: The platform aids in seamlessly replacing out-of-stock components, maintaining design integrity through comprehensive checks.

**Engagement and Presence**

JITX maintains a user-friendly online presence, offering resources and support through their website [jitx.com](http://www.jitx.com). They are also active participants in industry events, showcasing their innovation at places like DesignCon.

**In Summary**

JITX is not just another startup in the bustling tech scene of Berkeley; it is a beacon of how automation can redefine traditional industries. With a strong focus on AI-driven processes, they are making PCB design more efficient and accessible. If you're involved in electronics design, keeping an eye on JITX could be a smart move as technology continues to evolve rapidly.
